title: "sparklyr: An interface for Apache Spark"
format:
  html:
    theme: default
    toc: true
---

<img src="images/sparklyr.png" width=400 height=300 align="right"/>

-   Connect to [Spark](http://spark.apache.org/) from R. The sparklyr package provides a complete [dplyr](https://github.com/hadley/dplyr) backend.
-   Filter and aggregate Spark datasets <br/> then bring them into R for analysis and visualization.
-   Use Spark's distributed [machine learning](http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/mllib-guide.html) library from R.
-   Create [extensions](http://spark.rstudio.com/extensions.html) that call the full <br/> Spark API and provide interfaces to <br/> Spark packages.
